channel.title: Help with making shops
channel.description: Ok whenever i make a new shop in shop.cfg and autospawn.cfg to make the shop owner be in two places at once. It has worked fine before and when i compile it says its done. But when i run people cant get on :s Please help

item.title: Help with making shops
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

when that happens it means it is nulled. but to make the shops. you should be able just to make one shop in the shop.cfg then you get 2 of the same npc and place them in diferent places. or you can just get 2 different npcs and shops with the same items just in different places. if that doesnt do anything then posrt a picture on the eror u get when u run it.

Read full topic
